ygData.subject: Re: Kill Stealin
ygData.msgSnippet: First, I do not, blindly engage in shooting down everyones else s ideas. My point for the whole subject is that it will not solve the situation. Whats negative
ygData.messageBody:
First, I do not, blindly engage in shooting down everyones else's ideas.
My point for the whole subject is that it will not solve the situation.
Whats negative about that?
(This is starting to take the topic off track, if you wish debate my posts
on this subject matter I will be happy to do it in private).




Second, I never made the 'ODD' suggestion that killstealers would then
form groups. Next time get your facts straight? OK?
ever stating the 'ODD' suggestion that killstealers would then form groups
> class. You did offer up the rather odd suggestion that killstealers
> would then form groups to steal kills; whle this might be true, it would
> limit the actual areas that killstealers could affect on any given
